ComicInfo.Title: Hell Chapter V: Tunnel Crawlers
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Hell
ComicInfo.Summary: Stef, Samples, Capt. Lamb and the entire CalEx strike team have incurred casualties the moment they set foot into the blistering purgatory of the Underneath. They are the first human beings to venture into this alien landscape, with a convicted murderer, a drunken scientist, and a half-human, half-reptile native as their "guides." But first they have to contend with an entirely new enemy, a previously unglimpsed form of armored, mantis-like soldier bred solely for combat, engineered to protect and kill!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:47:50. [CVDB882430] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:23:06. [Issue ID 2560729]
ComicInfo.Writer: David J. Schow,David Schow,David J. Schow
